name: Epic Madrid Free Tour
description:
This tour is without doubt the best introduction to the most picturesque sights of Madrid.

Welcome to Epic tour of Madrid. If you are native or a spontaneous traveler and you want the real taste the Old Spain this is legendary adventure you are seeking.

We use the architecture of the city, bars, cafes, shops, and street sculptures as a metaphor to immerse you in the history of Spain and the lifestyle of its people.
